lead_paragraph: Despite metal detectors and armed guards at the doors to the Capitol and leading to galleries overlooking the Arkansas House, a state lawmaker says he would feel safer if he were allowed to pack his own heat.
snippet: Despite metal detectors and armed guards at the doors to the Capitol and leading to galleries overlooking the Arkansas House, a state lawmaker says he would feel safer if he were allowed to pack his own heat....

headline.main: Arkansas Legislator Wants to Pack Heat at State Capitol
headline.print_headline: Arkansas Legislator Wants to Pack Heat at State Capitol
